title: Anthony Albanese sits down with 7NEWS to discuss Australia's social media ban for under-16s
description: Anthony Albanese says Australia's social media ban for under-16s is about compliance, comparing the policy to restricting under-18s from entering pubs. See the full exclusive interview with the prime minister on 7NEWS.com.au #socialmedia #socialmediaban #auspol #albo #anthonyalbanese

title: Car crashes onto train track at Blaxland, causing delays across Sydney Trains network

title: Prada buys luxury fashion rival Versace
description: The Prada Group has officially purchased its Italian fashion rival, Versace, in a 1.25 billion euro ($A2.2 billion) deal. The merger is expected  to relaunch Versaceâ€™s fortunes, after the brand suffered financial struggles after the pandemic as part of the US luxury group Capri Holdings. #Prada #Versace #fashion #luxury #DonatellaVersace

title: Half a million old phones may be unable to call triple-0, Optus says
description: Around half a million phones may be unable to call triple-0 after the 3G shutdown, Optus has revealed. #optus #triple0 #triplezero #emergency #phone

title: Prada completes multi-billion Versace takeover | 7NEWS
description: Prada has completed its multi-billion dollar acquisition of rival Italian fashion house Versace after a six-month regulatory approval process. The purchase brings two of Italy's most culturally significant luxury brands under the same ownership, with Versace having been put up for sale by Capri Holdings in February following financial difficulties after the pandemic. Prada plans to revitalise the Versace brand and return it to its Italian manufacturing roots. title: NSW pushes e-bike crackdown after fatal crash | 7NEWS
description: New South Wales Premier Chris Minns is pushing for a ban on high-powered e-bikes and capping speeds at 25km per hour following another fatal crash in Sydney. The state currently allows 500-watt e-bikes, but industry experts argue this creates confusion and safety issues since major brands don't manufacture bikes specifically for this unique power rating, leading to cheaper, lower-quality products that are more easily modified and involved in fires. title: Lehrmann loses defamation appeal against Network 10 | 7NEWS
description: Bruce Lehrmann has lost his appeal against the ruling in his defamation case against Network 10 and journalist Lisa Wilkinson. The former Liberal staffer was attempting to overturn a Federal Court judgement that found on the balance of probabilities he had raped colleague Brittany Higgins in 2019. Justice Michael Wigney ruled that the original judgement was not unfair. title: Bruce Lehrmann's lawyer speaks outside court after appeal fails in defamation case
description: "I hope Bruce is seen as an inspiration to those who say they've been wrongly accused." Bruce Lehrmann's lawyer has spoken outside court in Sydney after the former Liberal staffer lost his appeal against the ruling in his defamation case against Network Ten and journalist Lisa Wilkinson. Zali Burrows says he will be seeking special leave to appeal to the High Court. #brucelehrmann #court #defamation #appeal #sydney
